resources.string: I\'ll be glad to answer your question!
I have been learning and using Java programing\n language for over 2 years and I have high\n confidence in my skills regarding this language.
Welcome to my Portfolio App. In this app I will share with you all the basic information about me as well as my educational qualifications and experiences till present.
Python is another programing language that I\n am fluent in. I can easily perform reading from\n and writing into files using this language.

SQL is an international standard language that 
we use for interacting with a relational database.
The sql skills i have gained include accessing,
updating and inserting data efficiently.
Teamwork skill is the ability to achieve a common\n goal and tackle the challenges by cooperating\n with others
Problem solving is the process of identifying \nthe problems and then implementing the best\n possible solution to tackle the problem.
Reading is one of the activities that I do in my leisure time. I mostly read online books of genre Sci-Fi and action.
Coding is also something I enjoy doing in my free time. Most of the times I solve random coding problems found in the Internet.
Sketching is another one of my hobbies. I mostly sketch during the weekends and I randomly start drawing characters from a video game or an anime.
This app is a Portfolio App where you can find the basic information about me and my hobbies and skills.
A hobby is any activity that is done during ones leisure time typically for pleasure and enjoyment.
A skill simply is proficiency or dexterity in any particular field acquired through training and experience. In this app, I will share with you the skills I have gained.
